definition: to keep out/to hold off/to ward off/to evade/to spread/to coat/to smear/to daub

sentences.english: Both the structure and principles of design of an electrical furnace for melting enamel frit have been recommended.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了电熔搪瓷瓷釉熔炉的结构及设计原理。

sentences.english: Besides, it is helpful for progress in enamel products industry technology.
sentences.chinese: 并有助于我国搪瓷行业搪瓷制品的技术进步。

sentences.english: Besides, it is helpful for progress in enamel products industry technology.
sentences.chinese: 并有助于我国搪瓷行业搪瓷制品的技术进步。

sentences.english: The dirt in a porcelain teacup is difficult to wipe off.
sentences.chinese: 搪瓷茶杯如果长期沉积茶垢，通常不易洗去。

sentences.english: Guangzhou Metro station has used enamelware steel cladding panel systems decoration panel for it wall.
sentences.chinese: 广州地铁车站采用了搪瓷板墙板系统作为墙面装饰板。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an enamel cup whose cup cover can cover the cup opening.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型是一种杯盖可以罩住杯口的搪瓷杯。

sentences.english: Cloisonné, also known as enamel, dates back about 500 years.
sentences.chinese: 景泰蓝，也叫搪瓷，能追溯到大约500年前。

sentences.english: For a bathroom I have two thermos bottles of water and an enameled bowl.
sentences.chinese: 洗澡间里的两个热水瓶和一个搪瓷盆是用来洗澡的。

sentences.english: Any of the following items come in enameled cast iron
sentences.chinese: 下面要介绍的这些炊具都是用搪瓷铸铁做成的。

sentences.english: The inner surface of the socket is bespread with enamel.
The processing technology is applied to enamel products of the surfaces of metal materials.
sentences.chinese: 本发明应用于金属材料表面搪瓷制品。

sentences.english: The fish scaling resistance of the ultra low carbon steel sheet for enameling has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了冷轧超低碳搪瓷钢板的抗鳞爆性能。

sentences.english: The precipitates enamelled steel sheet were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对搪瓷钢板中的析出物进行了研究。

sentences.english: The process and technical properties of enamelled whistling tea kettle are described.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了搪瓷叫嘴壶的技术性能和工艺要求。

definition: bone china (fine white porcelain made from a mixture of clay and bone ash)
to mend by stapling or cramping broken pieces together
